title: New: Julietta – Conquest
body:
NY’s **Julietta** (aka Julia Libani) enlists the help of longtime CitR favourites GEMS on her second offering, the deliciously alluring _Conquest_.

Mixing the majesty of Lorde, with the moody, atmospheric yearning more commonly associated with the likes of BANKS or Lykke Li, it’s a beautiful composed number. Check out Conquest below, alongside her debut track, Goosebumps. ([Premiered via](http://pressplayok.com/premiere-julietta-conquest/))
